Jazz at the Museum

Jazz at the Museum is a recurring jazz concert series running from August 23, 2025 through April 25, 2026. DMA fills its halls with the soulfoul sounds of live jazz every other month, featuring talented local bands. These events bring the halls of the DMA to life with live jazz bands in a lounge-inspired setting‚Äîcomplete with a full bar, light bites, and access to select exhibitions. Extras: Access to exhibitions, VIP dining options Pricing: $36 to $140; member discounts available

Venue: Dallas Museum of Art, 1717 N. Harwood St., Dallas, TX
City: Dallas
Area: Arts District

Manifest Your Purpose Small Business Saturday Market

A pop-up shopping experience featuring over 100 Black-owned businesses on November 29, 2025, from 12‚Äì6 PM. Offers over 100 Black-owned brands, cocktails, live DJ, food, and giveaways. Admission is free, with options to purchase tickets for cocktails or VIP access to panels and a swag bag.

Venue: Shops at Redbird Mall, 3662 West Camp Wisdom Road
City: Dallas
Area: Oak Cliff

2025-11-29

Dallas Food Festival

Dallas' Premier Food Fest showcasing local restaurants, local eateries, local cafes and local food trucks! This festival is all things surrounding Food so please come hungry!! Our festival will stretch over 8 Hours with a bunch of different participating vendors. Outside of food there will be plenty of fun including Live Music from some of Texas best bands! Bring a chair.

Venue: Dallas City Hall Plaza
City: Dallas
Area: Downtown

Late Night at the Museum

Part of the Meet Me at the Museum series, Late Night returns with more vibrant energy than ever‚Äîfeaturing live music, curated cocktails, curator talks, interactive art making, and after-hours access to our Level 1 and Level 2 galleries. For the November 7 Late Night event, International Surrealism is included in the price of admission. Return to Infinity: Yayoi Kusama tickets will be available for purchase on-site only.

Venue: Dallas Museum of Art
City: Dallas

2025-10-26

Hay Literary Festival

Step into a world of different experiences at Hay Festival Forum Dallas 2025. Taking place across the Bishop Arts District October 17-19, the program of 30 events features writers, musicians and activists in conversations, performances and book clubs.

Venue: Various
City: Dallas
Area: Bishop Arts
